title: The Stallion and the Rabbit
description: Alex is a reporter, determined to follow a great race through the Sahara and earn his name in his field. What he doesn't count on is desert cheiftan Alfahl kidnapping him and carrying him off. Alfahl needs and English tutor, and Alex fits the bill. Alex fascinates him, as much for the Arabian Nights style tales he tells as for his sweet body and foreign ways. Can these very different men find enough common ground to last together? Or will they become just another story?
author: Mike Shade
